name: NOBORU (Dro Hoshi)
description:
It's sunday and the Blending Game Jam 2018 is almost finished! We made this 3D puzzle/platformer game prototype in 48h.

NOBURU is a Virtual Reality Game created on HTC Vive.

You have to lead a bunch of strange little creatures through a puzzling sky.

Create stairs between platforms with the controller's trigger and follow the mystical path.

HAVE FUN AS MUCH AS WE HAVE DURING THIS GAME JAM.

Thomas, Bastien, Renaud, Ed, Marie, Alice => TEAM
